description: I LAY DOWN MY LIFE FOR YOU, the artist's fifth album and first since his Kanye collabs made him a snark target, swings back at everyone in sight — but saves a few knocks for himself.
title: JPEGMAFIA, rap's most tireless agitator, looks inward

description: On its surface, Good One is about a teen on a backpacking trip with her dad and his friend. But the film is so sharp and engrossing you might not notice the deeper story taking shape underneath.
title: In ‘Good One,’ a family camping trip is full of emotional switchbacks

description: The designer, known for dressing celebs to events like the Met Gala, has advice for those willing to challenge office norms.
title: Is it OK to wear shorts in the office? We asked designer Thom Browne for advice

description: The Democratic vice presidential candidate's taste for down-home Carhartt workwear and a camo cap have been getting a lot of media attention lately.
title: Carhartts and camo: What Tim Walz's folksy fashion sense says

description: Season 2 of HBO's Industry ended with a wedding, an arrest and a sacked star investor. Season 3 is the most dramatic and stress-inducing yet.
title: HBO's corporate drama 'Industry' is finally back. Here's a quick refresher

description: The World Anti-Doping Agency has blasted America's anti-doping organization for allowing athletes to compete after using performance enhancing drugs, if they agreed to serve as informants.
title: With the Summer Olympics in full swing, sports anti-doping agencies escalate feud

description: Muhammad Yunus arrived in Bangladesh from an overseas trip as he looks to restore calm and rebuild the country following an uprising that ended the rule of former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina.
title: Nobel laureate Yunus arrives in Bangladesh to take over as interim leader

description: Researchers from Oakland University surveyed hundreds of cat caregivers and found that cats exhibited behaviors associated with grief after a fellow cat or dog in the household died.
title: Do cats experience grief? New research suggests they might

description: Verbal, physical, and sexual aggression among dementia patients in long-term care facilities are alarmingly common. “There is a real problem with endemic violence,” one researcher says.
title: Violent dementia patients leave nursing home staff and residents ‘scared to death’

description: These lower-tech devices do not include many of the apps typically found on smartphones. And that may be appealing if you're looking to spend less time online.
title: Overwhelmed by your smartphone? Try switching to a basic phone

description: The meteor shower creates an opportunity to sit outside at night and watch shooting stars. It's also an opportunity for researchers to do some science.
title: The highly anticipated Perseid meteor shower is about to peak. Here's how to watch

description: The availability of last year's application, and subsequently students' aid packages, was delayed several times while the Department of Education worked to update the form.
title: The rollout for the updated FAFSA application has been delayed — again

description: Jury selection is to begin Monday and the judge is expected to rule on a motion that would dismiss the case against a former county official accused of killing investigative journalist Jeff German.
title: Trial set for Monday for an ex-politician accused of killing a Las Vegas reporter

description: Ashleigh Johnson is one of the best water polo goalkeepers in the world. Can she guide the U.S. women's team to another Olympic gold?
title: Ashleigh Johnson is a water polo champion. She might lead the U.S. to another gold
